mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_ID, PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID, QUANTITY) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{userId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID, P.TITLE, P.PRICE, P.IMAGE, P.BRAND, P.DISCOUNT_RATE, P.ORIGIN, P.DISCOUNTED_PRICE, C.CART_ID, C.QUANTITY,C.USER_ID FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY C.CART_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET QUANTITY = #{quantity} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CART WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
